lead_paragraph: After the cut-throat competition of the U.S. Olympic Trials, the Rio Games will be a swim in the park, Michael Phelps said on Saturday as the most decorated Olympian of all time prepared for his final races in the United States.

headline.main: Phelps Ready for His Final Races in the U.S
headline.print_headline: Phelps Ready for His Final Races in the U.S

snippet: After the cut-throat competition of the U.S. Olympic Trials, the Rio Games will be a swim in the park, Michael Phelps said on Saturday as the most decorated Olympian of all time prepared for his final races in the United States....
